title: Need Help % Problem With Email
body: Hello ! I have a problem. I gave my account to some friend and he is playing all the time and I tried to change my password but it dosent work.It says that there is a passcode on my email but that email that is on my lol account no longer exists.What can I do ??? Can you help me :( i cant change my email :/ i need change pass without email help riot

replies.body:
Weeeeeell it's never really a good idea to share an account with friends, seeing as it sounds like that friend might have changed the login information out from under you :(...

Let's see if we can get you back on the Rift soon! Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure to choose the option "I need help recovering my account". Once you verify yourself as the account creator they'll be able to assist you with getting control of it again!
